price: (41) And in ʿAad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.[1544]
arabic: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلۡعَقِيمَ
footnotes: [1544]- Barren of any benefit, i.e., evil.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wafī ʿādin idh arsalnā ʿalayhimu al-rīḥa al-ʿaqīma
